attributes.review: I downloaded this app just to see what it was like but as soon as I downloaded the app and clicked in I was so disgusted by thinking of Trump as our president for another four years that I threw up, no actually... like I’m not joking. It’s a terrible app and he’s a terrible man don’t download it thank you very much. Can you block an app from ever showing/being on your phone ever again? Like I dont even want it to be in my app store. I really want that right now, Apple you should hop on this idea.
attributes.title: f*ck trump 2020

attributes.review:
hi, i downloaded this app because i heard that harry styles would follow me on instagram when i did so. however it has been 2 minutes and this has not happened. i wanted nothing more than harry styles to notice me. i don't even want him to fall in love with me i just want to be his best friend. i got a notification from the app as soon as i downloaded it that ross lynch was on my porch so i ran to open my door at full speed and there was no one there. overall, i am tremendously disappointed with the app and think it should be taken down.

attributes.title: F U

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app so I could support our mr orange president but after a while I was just looking for some updates about our dearest mr pres when I suddenly stumbled upon a pee pee pick of the one and only mr trump . I was very shocked , confused , and very disturbed. It was not a very pleasing photo. I am now traumatized by the weird view of the photo . Every time I blink I remember . Haven’t been able to sleep for days because every time I close my eyes it’s just there . After a week I became very paranoid with the lack of sleep I’ve been getting and suddenly started hearing weird things all over my house . The one night I was able to finally fall asleep next to my cutie pie little doggy tea chihuahua ✨🦋daisy🦋✨ I had woken up in the middle of the night . Suddenly I got a pain in my back . It wasn’t like any pain I felt before , it felt like I had been stavbrf by thousands of needles all over my body , but where most of the pain was coming from was the behind of my body . I stood up went in front of the mirror to see if there was any marks on my body . There , there I was with bruises coveryung my entire body and cuts all over my legs and arms . The thing that stood out the most was the giant writing on my back . You would not believe what it said , it said “trump 2020”  . In my head I thought “ why is this happening, what is this , trump 2020?!?! , is this happening because of that one photo I viewed that day ??!?!.” I let out a tremendous scream as I stood in the front of my room . In the wall was carved “ trump 2020” very 
Vividly and very clear . Since I lived in a remote place I had no one to call out to. My only instinct was to run out . I ran and ran . I got on a bus that led me to the city to where my family lives . One I got to my family’s house I told no one what had happened afraid that what happened back there would come after me . To this day I had told no one about this :///
attributes.title: No
